items.title: 7 of the Best New Nonfiction Books of September 2025
items.description: This month, pick up Saeed Jones's and Maggie Smith's hopeful anthology, a memoir by literary darling Arundhati Ro, and more.

items.title: Read You in September: New Graphic Novel Releases
items.description: Among this month's offerings are awkward middle schoolers who correct injustice, nostalgic characters, magical forests, and haunted houses.

items.title: Adult Sci-Fi and Fantasy Authors Who’ve Also Written Children’s Books
items.description: Who is your favorite SFF author who writes for all ages?

items.title: 6 Darkly Humorous Horror Books
items.description: From Bigfoot terrorizing a reality TV cast to a tunnel that leads to a terrifying world, these will have you gagging. From fear and laughter.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for September 2, 2025
items.description: A Toni Morrison classic, the story of a murder a Harvard, women besieged in a castle descending into madness, and more of today's best book deals
